titleStmt.title: SII 12.152: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 152. (A.R. No. 305 of 1913). ON THE SAME WALL.

summary.p: The subjoined inscription, dated in the 7th year, also registers an order of Śōḻakōṉ to engrave on the ‘Vikramaśōḻaṉ-tirumāḷigai’ the deed of a gift of land made as tirunāmattukkāṇi by a certain Tittikka-Āḍuvāṉ, after purchase from Tiruchchiṟṟambala-Mūvēndavēḷāṉ of Kārikuḍi, for providing five offerings to the image of Dakshiṇāmūrti in addition to three already in vogue so as to correspond with the number of services offered to Mūlasthānam-Uḍaiyār, the principal deity in the temple. The donor mentioned in this record made a further gift of land 10 years later (No. 201 below) for providing offerings to the same image.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalabhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīAvaṉiyāḷappiṟantārāṉa kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu
7vatu coḻakoṉ Olai . teṉṉavaṉbrahmamārāyarum jayatuṅkappallavaraiyarum tillaiampa lapallavaraiyarum U
ṭaiyār tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyārkoyil śrīmāheśvarak kaṇkāṇi ceyvārkaḷum śrīkāriyañ ceyvārkaḷum sāmutāyañ cey
vārkaḷum koyilnāyakañ ceyvārkaḷum tirumāḷikaikkūṟu ceyvārkaḷum kaṇakkarum kaṇṭu viṭu tantatāvatu . Uṭaiyār śrīmula
sthānamuṭaiyār Amutu ceytaruḷi varukiṟa canti Eṭṭum Ikkoyil dakṣiṇāmuttidevar Amutu ceytaruḷavum Itukku muṉpu Amutu ce
taruḷi varukiṟa canti munṟu nikki Eṟṟamāka Amutuceytaruḷuñ canti Aiñcukkum Appam Aiñcukkum veṇṭu nivantattukku Uṭalāka kū
Uṭaiyāṉ tittikkaĀṭuvāṉ tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka kārikuṭaiyāṉ tirucciṟṟampala muventaveḷāṉ pakkal koṇṭu
viṭṭa rājādhirājavaḷanāṭṭu cemaṅkalattu viḷainilam Irupattumuṉṟemukkāle kāṇiyum Ūrnattattu Iṟaiyili maṉaika
ḷum Uḷppaṭa tirunāmattukkāṇiyāka Eḻutiṉa sādhanaṅkaḷ tirukkaiOṭṭip paṇṭārattu Oṭukkavum . Iṉṉilam tevatāṉa
Iṟaiyiliyāka tevar tirumukam Eḻutiṉapaṭi yāṇṭu Eḻāvatu mutal tevatāṉamum tiru nāmattukkāṇiyum Āka kaiykkoṇṭu pala
paṇinivantakkāṟarukku jivi[tamaṭaikkavum . Ippaṭikku vikkiramacoḻaṉ tirumāḷikaiyile kal veṭṭa kaṭavatāka pa
ṇṇuvate . Ippaṭi coḻakoṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟu pukunta Evaṟttiṭṭiṉpaṭi kal veṭṭiyatu ..
Digital edition of SII 12.152 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
